transcript: It was about four years ago right after we got married. We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne but no glasses. You asked me to dance so we took off our shoes and you popped the cork.

segments.text: It was about four years ago right after we got married.
We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne but no glasses.
You asked me to dance so we took off our shoes and you popped the cork.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: It was about four years ago, right after we got married.  We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne but no glasses.  You asked me to dance.  So we took off our shoes and you popped the cork.
